thread.title: Greece repays 2 billion euro arrears to IMF
thread.title_full: Greece repays 2 billion euro arrears to IMF | MENAFN.COM

author: Jordan News Agency
title: Greece repays 2 billion euro arrears to IMF
text:
(MENAFN - Jordan News Agency) Greece repaid the roughly 2 billion euros (2.2 billion) it owed to the International Monetary (IMF), the international body reported.

"I can confirm that Greece today repaid the totality of its arrears to the IMF, equivalent to SDR 1.6 billion (about EUR 2.0 billion). Greece is therefore no longer in arrears to the IMF," said Gerry Rice, director of communications at the IMF in a statement on Monday.

"As we have said, the Fund stands ready to continue assisting Greece in its efforts to return to financial stability and growth," CNBC said.
